title: Hebrew Character with Adonai written under the final He of YHWH
content:
Hello,  
Recently I've seen some examples of יהוה in Biblical text with אדני written under the final ה. Does anyone know of a font set with this as a set character perhaps similar to the Arabic الله?
author: Ratu Jeke

comments.content: That question was asked last december: [http://typophile.com/node/107656](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317095504/http:/typophile.com/node/107656 "http://typophile.com/node/107656")
